body:
Ha! That's kinda scary. I'll work on those additions to docker2boot.

I might as well stop being lazy and convert stage0 to be a systemd service while I'm at it. If we set ForwardToConsole in [journald.conf](http://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/journald.conf.html) then we'll get everything's output to console. This might be quite noisy but it's better then nothing.
